name: Mist Grey Marble
shortDescription: Elegant marble ideal for moist spaces.
description: A soft grey marble tile designed for luxurious bathrooms, combining water resistance with timeless elegance.

name: Pebble Slate Mosaic
description: Bring a natural touch to your shower floor with this slip-resistant slate-inspired mosaic.

name: Sandy Beige Harmony
shortDescription: Warm neutral shade for spa vibes.
description: Designed for serene bathrooms, this beige tile adds warmth while being easy to clean and maintain.

name: Oak Touch Ceramic
description: A wooden aesthetic in ceramic form, great for bathrooms needing warm visuals with zero moisture damage.

name: Ivory Spa Shine
description: Reflective and bright, this polished tile opens up smaller bathrooms and enhances natural light.

name: Desert Taupe Matte
description: Matte taupe tile that blends beautifully with sand-toned or wood-accented bathroom décor.

name: Rivers
description: Inspired by riverbeds, this tile offers both aesthetic and anti-slip safety for wet areas.

name: Glossy Midnight Black
shortDescription: Bold modern finish for striking bathrooms.
description: Perfect for creating contrast or statement walls, this high-gloss black tile is water-resistant and sleek.

name: Cloud White Marble
description: Emulating natural Carrara marble, this white tile brightens up bathrooms with subtle sophistication.

name: Ashgrain Texture Tile
description: Achieve the wooden look with the practicality of tile – great for bathroom floors and feature walls.

name: Frost Blue Ceramic
shortDescription: Cool tones for calm bathroom design.
description: A soothing icy blue shade brings a calming spa atmosphere to bath spaces or powder rooms.

name: Rustic Terracotta Touch
description: Terracotta tile adds a cozy old-world charm to bathrooms, especially in traditional or rustic homes.

name: Graphite Marble Veins
shortDescription: Dark, dramatic tile for stylish walls.
description: With strong vein patterns and a stone finish, this graphite tile suits modern or masculine bathroom themes.

name: Cream Gloss Comfort
shortDescription: Creamy gloss for a clean look.
description: A universal favorite for walls and floors, this vitrified tile offers easy maintenance and a polished appeal.

name: Striated Stone Grey
description: With its fine stone lines, this tile is a sleek and subtle option for contemporary bathroom spaces.
